attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Use construct_tool to create an 'validate_email' tool with implementation_strategy='code_generation'. Provide implementation_details with a JavaScript function: 'function(input) { const regex = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/; return { valid: regex.test(input.email), email: input.email }; }

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Use validate_email to check these emails: 'user@example.com', 'invalid.email', 'test@test.co.uk
